couldnt write yesterday had to work. today i almost got in a fight with a magic corner kid,( if you dont know what that is, its a kid that hangs out in the southeastern corner of our lobby and they tend to like the rpgs,anime,comics,card games, to an extent and scares most people, as for me i like the comics rpgs comics, but not like these kids, it gives me the willies) any way i slap the kid with fly paper, then my friend keleio slaps him with fly paper, and i sneak a piece of fly paper on the back of his jacket and i go up to him and smack the back of his head with fly paper,and keleio hits the side of his face with another piece of fly paper. the kid rips off the fly paper and smacks both pieces on my face i call him a bitch and i kick him in the ass, the hortaculture teacher mr berberich sees this and the kid and me have to stay after class

here at work i finished part two of the hsgqe. math i think i did pretty good. after the test my friends jake and mitch went to taco bell, but not before we had to help the shop teacher mr lords move lumber. the truck had a bed that tilted like a dump truck and wood boards were sliding off. a board slid off and it was about six feet way, another board slides off and pushes the other board which catches my shoe and crushes my toe. its ok though i think my fungus saved my toe. any whoo the people at taco bell are stupid. the total was like 9.80 and i give him 15 dollars to see what the dude would do. he uses the calculator on the cash register, he puts 15 in the register and takes out my five again and hands it back to me. and he screwed up my order dumb bitch.

did the high school graduation qualifying exam. atleast the first part ,writing, it was bs, so long, except if i fail this test i dont graduate. i watched once upon a time in mexico at skool, it almost got taken away, i should bring all of my movies, yea that would be tight.

once upon a time there was a kindergarten boy who needed to bring in something or tell something exciting to the class. when the teacher called the little boy to show or tell what he had, the little boy said ''i wanted to tell you about a period'' the teacher asked '' whats so exciting about a period?'' the little boy said '' damned if i know but this morning my sister missed hers and my dad had a heart attack, my mom fainted, and my sister's boyfriend shot himself in the head.''

happy memorial day everybody. here at home i just got done eating lunch i had hotdogs and hamburgers, yesterday i went to my friend andrew's new property, we hung out for a while had had a bbq, it was fun, i got 50 dollars mowing the lawn yesterday,score, i never should have brought my brother to wasilla, he was acting like a dumbass, no school today i was, dang i gotta go to work now.

here at home i got my graduation pics!! and i'm watching your friend andrew wk hes sweet. i met a freshmen chick named teah at graduation, she was hot, i cant wait til next. i was juss jokin about bustin a mack on her, and acted like a dumbass, but i think she took it seriously, and i think she was a little creeped out by me, :( . o well i think i can change her mind. dang shes hot, shes gonna be one of the reasons why i think next years gonna be good. my friend keith and i are gonna go to the american idol in anchorage, i think he has a chance, atleast he can sing

here at home tonights graduation night. i was gonna go to the grad blast but it starts at 10 and goes to 5 am, and that sucks cuz i have work and a curfew, damn you rules and my moral sense! its gonna be the last time i can take pictures cuz my photos came out like crap. well it starts soon so i gotta go

here at home i'm working on my english collage, and it looks of crizzap, its all good though, i am so tired from football practice, i havent worked out in several months so as you know i wasnt at the top of my game, eh so tired.

Here at home i just got back from anchorage and i finally saw mean girls! it was good i liked it, even if it was a chick flick, the only bad part was there were some crazy ass b!tches, this crazy little 13 year old comes up to us and starts talking, i know she was on something or drunk and i had to explain voodoo juice to a little girl, and a little girl takes a drink of her soda and spits on me i'm like what the hell and they leave it was Fd up, but the movie was good i give it a B. i also got my pic of me vanessa and kyle it turned out great except i have a green book cover on my head and kyle kinda looks like a old crack addicted frodo, only vanessa looks great and thats what matters, damg that was corny.

Just got back from work, today was the last day for the seniors. i'm gonna miss them, Chris, Junoir, Nick, Justin, Vanessa, David, Sean, Tiffany, Oland, espcecially vanessa mmm vanessa, shes great, shes perfect, smart hot and great personality, i just hope her mom (the art teacher) doesnt read this that would be awkward

DAMG its hot!! its 71 degrees! that may not me much in the lower 48s but remember i'm in alaska its hella hot. i dont think i'm gonna pass science its close to impossible now. which sucks, today wasnt a great day. i forgot my wallet at home, i tore my pants, i had to work alone today, and i'm gonna most likely fail science

at home its wednesday, its the last night of angel, and the season finally of smallville. i get to go to anchorage on saturday twice!! i gotta do my english final and my science final, and study for my spanish and math final. not good, not good at all.

here in my motel, i'm writing my essay that was due last week X_x. i need to get more organized. this keyboard kinda sucks. i dont know why its sorta less than responsive. anyway today kinda sucked i had to finish my forensics final, and i have til friday to do my final science project, my english final was due today, but i didnt do it. i dont know why its not really lazy. its more like hating to write about something i dont really care about, but i gotta do it anyway to get a grade. damn spyware i hate spyware,viruses, worms, adware, and all that other crap, i wish there was a free program to get rid of it all forever.
